extendedInfo.description: If you are The Pussycat Dolls's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check The Pussycat Dolls's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all The Pussycat Dolls's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of The Pussycat Dolls's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - PCD- Doll Domination-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Baby Love (J.R. Rotem Remix)- Beep- Bite The Dust- Bottle Pop- Buttons- Don't Cha- Don't Wanna Fall In Love- Elevator- Feelin' Good- Flirt- Halo- Happily Never After- Hot Stuff (I Want You Back)- How Many Times, How Many Lies- Hush Hush- I Don't Need A Man- I Hate This Part- If I Was A Man- I'm Done- In Person- Lights, Camera, Action- Love The Way You Love Me- Magic- Out Of This Club- Perhaps, Perhaps, Perhaps- Played- Right Now- Space- Stickwitu- Sway- Tainted Love / Where Did Our Love Go- Takin' Over The World- Until U Love U- Wait A Minute- We Went As Far As We Felt Like Going- Whatcha Think About That- Whatchamacallit- When I Grow Up- Who's Gonna Love You
